column1: James Milner (Liverpool) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. Liverpool will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.
Goal - 1:0! Sadio Mane laid the ball off to Roberto Firmino (Liverpool), who slots it into the back of the net from close range, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
Sadio Mane (Liverpool) fouls an opponent during an attacking move.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) unleashes a decent shot towards the roof of the net, but Petr Cech thwarts him with a nice save. Liverpool force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.
Goal! Roberto Firmino displays great vision and sends a pass to Sadio Mane (Liverpool), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the back of the net. The score is 2:0.
Great teamplay by Liverpool as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.

Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the middle of the goal. Petr Cech guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) collects a pass on the edge of the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender. Liverpool force their opponents to concede a corner.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.

Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) bursts inside the box, beats two defenders and produces a strike from the penalty spot. The shot has power, but lacks precision and the goalkeeper stops it easily. The scoreline remains the same.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) tries to send a pass but it's blocked. The ball is out of play and Liverpool manage to earn a corner.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) gets on the ball and beats an opponent, but his run is stopped by the referee Robert Madley who sees an offensive foul.

Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) dances his way past two defending players and gets to the edge of the box from where he unleashes a shot that goes well over the bar. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.

Joel Matip (Liverpool) leaps highest in the penalty area to get on the end of a cross from the set piece, and he produces a promising goal-bound header towards the left side of the goal, but Petr Cech pulls off a decent save to deny him.
Divock Origi (Liverpool) is really unlucky not to score after heading the ball onto the right post!

Sadio Mane (Liverpool) releases a low pass from just outside the box in an attempt to find his teammate, but one of the defenders calmly averts the threat. The ball goes out of play. Liverpool are awarded a corner kick.

It's in! Divock Origi spots his teammate in a good position on the edge of the box and provides him with a nice pass. Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) doesn't think twice and rifles a first-time shot into the bottom right corner. The score is now 3:1.
